TerrainDataEntry.Name: Bedrock
TerrainDataEntry.Description: This dense rock appears to be laced with traces of Iron and Lithium. Searching in the nearby area should yield some useful ore!

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Hardened Resin
TerrainDataEntry.Description: This incredibly hard organic structure appears to be shielding a soft and vulnerable core. Only Nano-Disintegrators will be able to cut through this.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: CryoPlasm
TerrainDataEntry.Description: This incredibly hard organic non-newtonian liquid has been awoken by our Climate Control Centre! We'll need specialist weaponry to deal with this!

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Cryoplasm
TerrainDataEntry.Description: This incredibly hard organic non-newtonian liquid has been awoken by our Climate Control Centre! We'll need specialist weaponry to deal with this!

TerrainDataEntry.Name: CryoPlasm Lancer
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Short-range, fast, CryoPlasm defence

ValueEntry.Name: CryoPlasm Lancer
ValueEntry.Description: Short-range, fast, CryoPlasm defence

ValueEntry.Name: CryoPlasm Melter
ValueEntry.Description: Melts CryoPlasm at a medium range. Useful only when paired with other types of defence.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: CryoPlasm Dazzler Turret
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Long-range, fast, CryoPlasm defence. Can only work in straight lines. Requires 250k power to trigger.

ValueEntry.Name: Partially Ablated Resin
ValueEntry.Description: The tough outer coating has been ablated; we should now be able to liquidise the soft inner core.

ValueEntry.Name: Ablated Resin
ValueEntry.Description: The tough outer coating has been ablated; we should now be able to liquidise the soft inner core.

ValueEntry.Name: Liquified Resin
ValueEntry.Description: The resin has now been liquified, and can be collected.

ValueEntry.Name: Adventures Pack DLC
ValueEntry.Description: Thank you for buying the Adventures Pack DLC!

ValueEntry.Name: CRP DLC KEY
ValueEntry.Description: Thank you for being a Patreon supporter! http://patreon.com/FortressCraft

ValueEntry.Name: Diamond Crystal
ValueEntry.Description: These low-level crystals can be polished up and used in a variety of lenses and other useful items.

ValueEntry.Name: Emerald Crystal
ValueEntry.Description: These low-level crystals can be polished up and used in a variety of lenses and other useful items.

ValueEntry.Name: Ruby Crystal
ValueEntry.Description: These low-level crystals can be polished up and used in a variety of lenses and other useful items.

ValueEntry.Name: Sapphire Crystal
ValueEntry.Description: These medium-level crystals can be polished up and used in a variety of lenses and other useful items.

ValueEntry.Name: Topaz Crystal
ValueEntry.Description: These high-level crystals can be polished up and used in a variety of lenses and other useful items.

ValueEntry.Name: Sugalite Crystal
ValueEntry.Description: These high-level crystals can be polished up and used in a variety of lenses and other useful items, and have a number of amazing properties. Go get some more!

ValueEntry.Name: Orange GlowPod
ValueEntry.Description: This doesn't appear to be very useful.

ValueEntry.Name: Blue GlowPod
ValueEntry.Description: This plant seems to thrive in the colder atmosphere. Maybe moving slightly deeper could yield something useful?

ValueEntry.Name: Green GlowPod
ValueEntry.Description: This plant seems to contain strong filters to deal with a toxic atmosphere. Maybe moving slightly deeper could yield something useful?

ValueEntry.Name: Purple GlowPod
ValueEntry.Description: This doesn't appear to be very useful.

ValueEntry.Name: GlowShroom
ValueEntry.Description: This doesn't appear to be very useful.

ValueEntry.Name: BaubleBerry
ValueEntry.Description: Harvest for Seeds.

ValueEntry.Name: Mandragora
ValueEntry.Description: Harvest for Seeds.

ValueEntry.Name: UnderGrump
ValueEntry.Description: Harvest for Seeds.

ValueEntry.Name: GoopyDangler
ValueEntry.Description: This doesn't appear to be very useful yet.

ValueEntry.Name: CoxComb
ValueEntry.Description: Harvest for Seeds.

ValueEntry.Name: LeafyDangler
ValueEntry.Description: Harvest for Seeds.

ValueEntry.Name: Cold Cavern Flora 1
ValueEntry.Description: This plant seems to thrive in the colder atmosphere.

ValueEntry.Name: Cold Cavern Flora 2
ValueEntry.Description: This plant seems to thrive in the colder atmosphere.

ValueEntry.Name: Cold Cavern Flora 3
ValueEntry.Description: This plant seems to thrive in the colder atmosphere.

ValueEntry.Name: Cold Cavern Flora 4
ValueEntry.Description: This plant seems to thrive in the colder atmosphere.

ValueEntry.Name: Cold Cavern Flora 5
ValueEntry.Description: This plant seems to thrive in the colder atmosphere.

ValueEntry.Name: Cold Cavern Flora 6
ValueEntry.Description: This plant seems to thrive in the colder atmosphere.

ValueEntry.Name: Cold Cavern Flora 7
ValueEntry.Description: This plant seems to thrive in the colder atmosphere.

ValueEntry.Name: TundraBreath
ValueEntry.Description: Harvest for Seeds.

ValueEntry.Name: Toxic Cavern Flora 1
ValueEntry.Description: This plant seems to thrive in the toxic atmosphere.

ValueEntry.Name: Toxic Cavern Flora 2
ValueEntry.Description: This plant seems to thrive in the toxic atmosphere.

ValueEntry.Name: Toxic Cavern Flora 3
ValueEntry.Description: This plant seems to thrive in the toxic atmosphere.

ValueEntry.Name: Toxic Cavern Flora 4
ValueEntry.Description: This plant seems to thrive in the toxic atmosphere.

ValueEntry.Name: Toxic Cavern Flora 5
ValueEntry.Description: This plant seems to thrive in the toxic atmosphere.

ValueEntry.Name: Toxic Cavern Flora 6
ValueEntry.Description: This plant seems to thrive in the toxic atmosphere.

ValueEntry.Name: Toxic Cavern Flora 7
ValueEntry.Description: This plant seems to thrive in the toxic atmosphere.

ValueEntry.Name: Hydroponics Bay
ValueEntry.Description: Can grow automated plants.

ValueEntry.Name: Hydroponics Canopy
ValueEntry.Description: Automatically built!

ValueEntry.Name: Advanced Hydroponics Bay
ValueEntry.Description: Grows plants much faster. Maybe requires power, haven't decided.

ValueEntry.Name: Emergency Siren
ValueEntry.Description: Attach to a machine to monitor it.

ValueEntry.Name: Orange Warning Light
ValueEntry.Description: Attach to a machine to monitor it.

ValueEntry.Name: Red Warning Light
ValueEntry.Description: Attach to a machine to monitor it.

ValueEntry.Name: Warning Strobe
ValueEntry.Description: Attach to a machine to monitor it.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Organic Detritus
TerrainDataEntry.Description: This thick, disgusting mess covers the entire planet.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Central Power Hub
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Generates a little energy.\nCan burn resources for energy.\nCharges adjacent structures.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Ore Extractor
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Efficiently extracts ore.\nStores 25 Ore.\nExtracts 1 Ore/min.

ValueEntry.Name: Power Storage Block
ValueEntry.Description: Stores a little energy.\nReceives energy from other sources.\nTransfers energy to other machines.

ValueEntry.Name: Power Storage MK2
ValueEntry.Description: Stores more energy.\nReceives energy from other sources.\nTransfers energy to other machines.

ValueEntry.Name: Power Storage MK3
ValueEntry.Description: Stores more energy.\nReceives energy from other sources.\nTransfers energy to other machines.

ValueEntry.Name: Organic Power Storage
ValueEntry.Description: Can only transfer energy slowly.

ValueEntry.Name: StorageHopper
ValueEntry.Description: Stores 100 Items.\nAuto transfers.\nUse E to alter transfer type.

ValueEntry.Name: LogisticsHopper
ValueEntry.Description: Auto transfers 1 item per 10s.

ValueEntry.Name: MiniHopper
ValueEntry.Description: Auto transfers 1 item per 30s.

ValueEntry.Name: CryoHopper
ValueEntry.Description: Keeps items cold. Needs Power. More efficient if placed somewhere cold.

ValueEntry.Name: Motorised Logistics Hopper
ValueEntry.Description: Not implemented because the conveyor belt is the limiting factor, not the hopper. Ooops.

ValueEntry.Name: Directional Storage Hopper
ValueEntry.Description: Identical to a normal Storage Hopper, but can only output in one direction. Use R to rotate.

ValueEntry.Name: Bomber FALCOR
ValueEntry.Description: Drops crafted bombs, long range, onto dense creep.

ValueEntry.Name: FALCOR MK1
ValueEntry.Description: Collects Dropped Loot from FALCOR Beacons and returns it.\nNeeds attached storage hopper.

ValueEntry.Name: Logistics FALCOR
ValueEntry.Description: Collects items from FALCOR Beacons attached to remote Storage Hoppers and returns it.\nNeeds attached storage hopper.

ValueEntry.Name: HerbiCor
ValueEntry.Description: Collects nearby outdoor unharvested Plants and returns them.\nNeeds attached storage hopper.

ValueEntry.Name: SpiderCor
ValueEntry.Description: Collects nearby outdoor unharvested Plants and returns them.\nNeeds attached storage hopper.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: SpiderBotBase
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Not relevant

ValueEntry.Name: Basic Laser Energy Transmitter
ValueEntry.Description: Transmits power slowly over distances.\nMax dist 64.\nUpgrade ASAP.

ValueEntry.Name: Laser Energy Transmitter MK1
ValueEntry.Description: Transmits power over distances.\nMax dist 64.\nAim at batteries.

ValueEntry.Name: Laser Energy Transmitter MK2
ValueEntry.Description: Transmits even more power!

ValueEntry.Name: Laser Energy Transmitter MK3
ValueEntry.Description: The largest single-block energy transmitter.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Logic Laser Emitter
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Creative Laser Machine.\nUnimplemented

TerrainDataEntry.Name: BFL-9000
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Massive Mining Laser.\nCuts 5x5 tunnel.\nMassive energy demands.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Pyrothermic Generator
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Burns fuel for energy.\nBurns 1 fuel unit/minute.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Solar Panel
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Generates energy in daylight\nCharges adjacent batteries.

ValueEntry.Name: Solar Panel
ValueEntry.Description: Generates energy in daylight\nCharges adjacent batteries.

ValueEntry.Name: Organic Solar Panel
ValueEntry.Description: Generates a minor amount of energy during the night, from Novalight.\nCharges adjacent batteries.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: AI Mover Control
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Creates a single AI robot.\nMoves ore between Hoppers.\nLow effort, low efficiency.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Matter Mover
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Best used if you have a surplus of power.

ValueEntry.Name: Basic Matter Mover
ValueEntry.Description: Transmits up to 150 items/min at a range of 64m

ValueEntry.Name: Dual Matter Mover
ValueEntry.Description: Transmits up to 300 items/min at a range of 32m

ValueEntry.Name: Quad Matter Mover
ValueEntry.Description: Transmits up to 600 items/min at a range of 16m

ValueEntry.Name: Multi Matter Mover
ValueEntry.Description: Transmits up to 4800 items/min at a range of 8m

ValueEntry.Name: Ore Smelter
ValueEntry.Description: This is your primary method for generating Ingots of resources.

ValueEntry.Name: Basic Ore Smelter
ValueEntry.Description: Double the speed of a normal smelter, but reduced ore efficiency. Cannot be upgraded.

ValueEntry.Name: Forced Induction
ValueEntry.Description: Increases Ore Smelting rate and power usage.\nPlace on TOP of Ore Smelters.

ValueEntry.Name: MK2 Forced Induction
ValueEntry.Description: Increases Ore Smelting rate and power usage.\nPlace on TOP of Ore Smelters.

ValueEntry.Name: MK3 Forced Induction
ValueEntry.Description: Increases Ore Smelting rate and power usage.\nPlace on TOP of Ore Smelters.

ValueEntry.Name: MK4 Forced Induction
ValueEntry.Description: Increases Ore Smelting rate and power usage.\nPlace on TOP of Ore Smelters.

ValueEntry.Name: MK5 Forced Induction
ValueEntry.Description: Increases Ore Smelting rate and power usage.\nPlace on TOP of Ore Smelters.

ValueEntry.Name: ARC Smelter Upgrade
ValueEntry.Description: Increases Ore Smelting rate and power usage.\nPlace on TOP of Ore Smelters.

ValueEntry.Name: Basic Conveyor Belt
ValueEntry.Description: Slowly transfers materials from Hoppers

ValueEntry.Name: Conveyor Belt
ValueEntry.Description: Transfers materials from Hoppers

ValueEntry.Name: Conveyor Belt Filter
ValueEntry.Description: Removes materials based on rules

ValueEntry.Name: Transport Pipe
ValueEntry.Description: Allows transfer in all directions

ValueEntry.Name: Transport Pipe Filter
ValueEntry.Description: Removes materials based on rules

ValueEntry.Name: Stamper Plant
ValueEntry.Description: Turn Bars into Plates

ValueEntry.Name: Extrusion Plant
ValueEntry.Description: Turn Bars into Wires

ValueEntry.Name: Coiler Plant
ValueEntry.Description: Turns Wires into Coils

ValueEntry.Name: Pipe Extrusion Plant
ValueEntry.Description: Turns Bars into Pipes

ValueEntry.Name: PCB Assembling Plant
ValueEntry.Description: Turns Coils into PCBs

ValueEntry.Name: Conveyor Turntable
ValueEntry.Description: Automatically distributes items

ValueEntry.Name: Advanced Conveyor Filter
ValueEntry.Description: Filters specific items at T2 Pipe speeds

ValueEntry.Name: Up Sloped Conveyor
ValueEntry.Description: Upward sloped, basic speed conveyor!

ValueEntry.Name: Down Sloped Conveyor
ValueEntry.Description: Downward sloped, basic speed conveyor!

ValueEntry.Name: Motorised Conveyor
ValueEntry.Description: Extracts items from a hopper at up to 150 per minute!

ValueEntry.Name: Basic Conveyor(Clockwise)
ValueEntry.Description: The same as Basic Conveyors, only prettier.

ValueEntry.Name: Basic Conveyor(CounterClockwise)
ValueEntry.Description: The same as Basic Conveyors, only prettier.

ValueEntry.Name: Conveyor(Clockwise)
ValueEntry.Description: The same as Conveyors, only prettier.

ValueEntry.Name: Conveyor(CounterClockwise)
ValueEntry.Description: The same as Conveyors, only prettier.

ValueEntry.Name: Zipper Merge
ValueEntry.Description: Combines 2 lines into 1 with a guaranteed 50:50 ratio.

ValueEntry.Name: 3'n1 Zipper Merge
ValueEntry.Description: Rapidly combines 2 lines into 1 in the order RRR L. Use this to make Research Pod assembly a doddle!

ValueEntry.Name: Rapid Zipper Merge
ValueEntry.Description: Rapidly combines 2 lines into 1 with a guaranteed 50:50 ratio.

ValueEntry.Name: Priority Splitter
ValueEntry.Description: Sends all incoming items Right, unless blocked, then Left.

ValueEntry.Name: Minecart Depot
ValueEntry.Description: Places a Minecart from an attached Storage Hopper

ValueEntry.Name: Minecart Brake
ValueEntry.Description: Reduce the Minecart's speed

ValueEntry.Name: Minecart Turbo Rail
ValueEntry.Description: Increase the Minecart's speed

ValueEntry.Name: Minecart Unload Station
ValueEntry.Description: Place resources from Cart into attached Hoppers

ValueEntry.Name: Minecart Load Station
ValueEntry.Description: Place resources on the Cart from attached Hoppers

ValueEntry.Name: Track Straight
ValueEntry.Description: Allows Minecarts to travel in a straight line.

ValueEntry.Name: Track Corner
ValueEntry.Description: Allows Minecarts to travel around corners.

ValueEntry.Name: Track Slope
ValueEntry.Description: Allows Minecarts to travel around up slopes.

ValueEntry.Name: Minecart Buffer
ValueEntry.Description: Turns the Minecart around

ValueEntry.Name: Minecart Full Gate
ValueEntry.Description: Minecarts following the RED arrow will turn around unless FULL. GREEN is freely passable.

ValueEntry.Name: Minecart Empty Gate
ValueEntry.Description: Minecarts following the RED arrow will turn around unless EMPTY. GREEN is freely passable.

ValueEntry.Name: One Way Track
ValueEntry.Description: Directs Freight Carts in one direction

ValueEntry.Name: ConstructoBot Direction
ValueEntry.Description: Forces ConstructoBots to head in this direction.

ValueEntry.Name: ConstructoBot Cargo Control
ValueEntry.Description: ConstructoBots with cargo will head in the the direction of the GREEN arrow.

ValueEntry.Name: ConstructoBot Loaded Control
ValueEntry.Description: Full ConstructoBots will head in this direction.

ValueEntry.Name: ConstructoBot Unloaded Control
ValueEntry.Description: Empty ConstructoBots will head in this direction.

ValueEntry.Name: ConstructoBot Power Control
ValueEntry.Description: Low-power ConstructoBots will head in this direction.

ValueEntry.Name: ConstructoBot T-junction
ValueEntry.Description: ConstructoBots will alternate Left/Right on hitting this.

ValueEntry.Name: ConstructoBot Sprayer
ValueEntry.Description: Randomise ConstructoBots paint schemes.

ValueEntry.Name: ConstructoBot Cold Protector
ValueEntry.Description: Applies Cold Protection to ConstructoBots.

ValueEntry.Name: ConstructoBot Charger
ValueEntry.Description: Charges a ConstructoBot.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: ConstructoBot Constructor
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Builds a ConstructoBot from input conveyors with Arm, Body and Legs.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: ConstructoBot Crate
TerrainDataEntry.Description: A Logistics-compatible Robot in a crate!

TerrainDataEntry.Name: H.O.D.O.R.
TerrainDataEntry.Description: High Orbital Debris Object Reclaimer allows launching of a missile to knock orbital debris down to the surface. Build in a 3x1x3 configuration.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Fuel Compressor
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Compresses carbon particulates with High-Energy Composite Fuel to generate an extremely volatile and energy-rich fuel source.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Orbital RailGun Controller
TerrainDataEntry.Description: North. This faces North.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Orbital RailGun Induction Ring
TerrainDataEntry.Description: North. This faces North.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Research Station
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Process scans and research\ntechnologies. Requires power.

ValueEntry.Name: Basic Missile Assembler(OLD)
ValueEntry.Description: Crafts Missiles from Fuel, Tubes and Wire.

ValueEntry.Name: Organic Reassembler(OLD)
ValueEntry.Description: Crafts Ruined Organic Components.

ValueEntry.Name: Coal Enricher(OLD)
ValueEntry.Description: Slowly Enriches Coal.

ValueEntry.Name: Basic Missile Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Crafts Missiles from Fuel, Tubes and Wire.

ValueEntry.Name: Organic Reassembler
ValueEntry.Description: Crafts Ruined Organic Components.

ValueEntry.Name: Coal Enricher
ValueEntry.Description: Slowly Enriches Coal.

ValueEntry.Name: Plasma Head Charger
ValueEntry.Description: Imbues Steel Heads with energy.

ValueEntry.Name: Pipe Coater
ValueEntry.Description: Creates heat conductive pipes.

ValueEntry.Name: Mesh Weaver
ValueEntry.Description: Weaves meshes from crystal fibers.

ValueEntry.Name: Empty Missile Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Crafts Empty Missiles from High Energy Composite Fuel, Copper Pipes and Gold Wire.

ValueEntry.Name: Missile Fueller
ValueEntry.Description: Fills Empty Missiles with High Energy Composite Fuel.

ValueEntry.Name: Armour Piercing Warhead Fitter
ValueEntry.Description: Uses Pristine Stingers to fit Armour-Piercing rounds.

ValueEntry.Name: Warhead Imbuer
ValueEntry.Description: Imbues Basic Missiles with Plasma-Enriched energy.

ValueEntry.Name: Lithium Coil Charger
ValueEntry.Description: Imbues 5x Lithium Coils with Energy to give a single Charged Lithium Coil. Used extensively in crafting.

ValueEntry.Name: Liquid Resin Refiner
ValueEntry.Description: Refine Liquid Resin into the spectacularly useful Refined Liquid Resin.

ValueEntry.Name: Rack Railer
ValueEntry.Description: Crafts Rack Rails for Cargo Lifts from Iron Gears

ValueEntry.Name: MK1 PowerCore Charger
ValueEntry.Description: Autocrafts a single-use Power Booster. This will give ARTHER 100 power. Place the crafted item into your hotbar to use it.

ValueEntry.Name: MK2 PowerCore Charger
ValueEntry.Description: Autocrafts a single-use Power Booster. This will give ARTHER 250 power. Place the crafted item into your hotbar to use it.

ValueEntry.Name: MK3 PowerCore Charger
ValueEntry.Description: Autocrafts a single-use Power Booster. This will give ARTHER 500 power. Place the crafted item into your hotbar to use it.

ValueEntry.Name: MK4 PowerCore Charger
ValueEntry.Description: Autocrafts a single-use Power Booster. This will give ARTHER 1000 power. Place the crafted item into your hotbar to use it.

ValueEntry.Name: MK5 PowerCore Charger
ValueEntry.Description: Autocrafts a single-use Power Booster. This will give ARTHER 2500 power. Place the crafted item into your hotbar to use it.

ValueEntry.Name: Crystal Clock Maker
ValueEntry.Description: Creates a clock made from crystal. Used to keep electronics running at a fixed rate.

ValueEntry.Name: OverClocker
ValueEntry.Description: Uses large amount of power to carefully overclock Crystal Clocks. Used in high-end machines.

ValueEntry.Name: Crystal Coal Infuser
ValueEntry.Description: Infuses Enriched Coal with Crystal Ore.

ValueEntry.Name: Fuel Canister Crafter
ValueEntry.Description: Uses a single Iron Pipe to make an Empty Fuel Canister.

ValueEntry.Name: CryoChilled Missile Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Uses Freezon Canisters to add a slowing effect to targeted mobs. Also gives 15% extra damage!

ValueEntry.Name: Mephitic Missile Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Uses Chlorine Canisters to add a damage-over-time effect to targeted mobs, adding 50% damage over 30 seconds.

ValueEntry.Name: Steel Alloy Smelter
ValueEntry.Description: Automatically smelts Low-grade Steel Bars from Iron and Nickel.

ValueEntry.Name: Advanced Machine Block Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Automatically create Advanced Machine Blocks from Steel and Crystal Clocks.

ValueEntry.Name: Imbued Machine Block Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Automatically create Imbued Machine Blocks from PowerBoosters and Advanced MachineBlocks.

ValueEntry.Name: Lens Polisher
ValueEntry.Description: Uses precision technology to produce an unfocused lens from any lower-tier of lens. Can then be chrome-plated to be used in Laser Power Transmitters.

ValueEntry.Name: Lens Chromer
ValueEntry.Description: Mirror-coats a high-precision unfocused lens to provide a useful upgrade.

ValueEntry.Name: Cryo Bomb Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Created a bomb specifically designed to be delivered by Bomber FALCORs to defeat large quantities of long-range CryoPlasm.

ValueEntry.Name: Chromed Block Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Chrome-plates Imbued Machine Blocks.

ValueEntry.Name: Hiemal Block Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Cold-infuses Chrome and Magnetic Blocks together to create this heat-proof block.

ValueEntry.Name: Magnetic Block Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Magnetises Imbued Machine Blocks.

ValueEntry.Name: Alloyed Block Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Uses gold to coat Hardened Machine Blocks.

ValueEntry.Name: HardenedBlock Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Uses a mixture of Nickel and Titanium to create hardened blocks.

ValueEntry.Name: Construction Paste Grinder
ValueEntry.Description: Uses 'garbage' blocks to make Construction Paste.

ValueEntry.Name: Cluster Missile Crafter
ValueEntry.Description: Takes a single Imbued Missile and turns it into 8 rapid-fire missiles, each doing 1/4 of the original damage, for a total of double the damage.

ValueEntry.Name: ConstructoBot Coppator Chassis Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Constructs Tier 0 (Coppator) ConstructoBot Chassis.

ValueEntry.Name: ConstructoBot Tindron Chassis Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Constructs Tier 1 (Tindron) ConstructoBot Chassis.

ValueEntry.Name: ConstructoBot Bronzite Chassis Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Constructs Tier 2 (Bronzite) ConstructoBot Chassis.

ValueEntry.Name: ConstructoBot Ironide Chassis Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Constructs Tier 2 (Ironide) ConstructoBot Chassis.

ValueEntry.Name: ConstructoBot Leg Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Constructs Tier 0 (Coppator) ConstructoBot Legs.

ValueEntry.Name: ConstructoBot Arm Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Crafts Tier 0 (Coppator) ConstructoBot Arms.

ValueEntry.Name: ConstructoBot Herb Arm Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Crafts ConstructoBot Herb Arms.

ValueEntry.Name: Super Construction Paste Grinder
ValueEntry.Description: Uses 'garbage' or Coal blocks to make Construction Paste at a 1:8 ratio.

ValueEntry.Name: Ampule Crafter
ValueEntry.Description: Place below an Ampule Dispenser, attached to a Storage Hopper of plant seeds.

ValueEntry.Name: Primary Upgrade Module Maker
ValueEntry.Description: Turns 10 Tin PCBs into one useful Primary Upgrade Module.

ValueEntry.Name: Secondary Upgrade Module Maker
ValueEntry.Description: Uses 5 Nickel PCBs to upgrade a Primary Upgrade Module into 1 useful Secondary Upgrade Module.

ValueEntry.Name: Alloyed Upgrade Module Maker
ValueEntry.Description: Takes Secondary Upgrade modules and Alloys them into 1 useful Alloyed Upgrade Module.

ValueEntry.Name: Ultimate Upgrade Module Maker
ValueEntry.Description: Upgrades Advanced Modules into Ultimates.

ValueEntry.Name: Iron Gear Maker
ValueEntry.Description: Creates Iron Gears from Iron Plates.

ValueEntry.Name: Lightweight Machine Housing Crafter
ValueEntry.Description: Turns 6 plates into 1 Housing.

ValueEntry.Name: ServoMotor Maker
ValueEntry.Description: Turns 3 Wires into 1 Servo Motor.

ValueEntry.Name: Titanium Housing Crafter
ValueEntry.Description: Turns 6 plates into 1 Housing.

ValueEntry.Name: Gold Foil Crafter
ValueEntry.Description: Turns 5 Gold Wire into 1 Gold Foil.

ValueEntry.Name: Basic Conveyor Crafter
ValueEntry.Description: Turns 1 Copper Bar into 15 Basic Conveyors.

ValueEntry.Name: Conveyor Crafter
ValueEntry.Description: Upcrafts Basic Conveyors into faster Conveyors using Tin Plates and Copper Wire.

ValueEntry.Name: ScrapTrack Crafter
ValueEntry.Description: Builds cheap but slow ScrapTrack.

ValueEntry.Name: Minecart Track Crafter
ValueEntry.Description: Upcrafts ScrapTrack Rails into into faster Minecart Track Trails.

ValueEntry.Name: PrecisionAlloyed MachineBlock Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Uses an alternate method of creating Alloyed Machine Blocks, more useful for certain base setups.

ValueEntry.Name: Turret MK1
ValueEntry.Description: Good for infrastructure defence.

ValueEntry.Name: Turret MK2
ValueEntry.Description: Good for base defence.

ValueEntry.Name: Turret MK3
ValueEntry.Description: Good for long range defence.

ValueEntry.Name: Missile Turret MK1
ValueEntry.Description: Single-shot fires missiles at larger targets up to 512m away!

ValueEntry.Name: Missile Turret MK2
ValueEntry.Description: Dual-shot fires missiles at larger targets up to 512m away!

ValueEntry.Name: Missile Turret MK3
ValueEntry.Description: Tri-shot fires missiles at larger targets up to 512m away!

ValueEntry.Name: Missile Turret MK4
ValueEntry.Description: Quad-shot fires missiles at larger targets up to 512m away!

ValueEntry.Name: The Itano
ValueEntry.Description: Multi-shot launcher. The circus is in town!

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Threat Scanner
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Place near your base for an early-warning system.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Hard Resin Detector
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Provides an essential early-warning system for encroaching hiveminds.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Crashed parts container
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Contains technical components we can use for research.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Server Monitor
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Gives you read-time readouts of your server status. Not a 'game' item.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Orbital Strike Controller
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Nuke the site from orbit. It's the only way to be sure. Requires a fully-charged OET.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Auto Excavator
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Automatically dig out large vertical shafts from below.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Laser Resin Ablator
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Converts nearby Hardened Resin into Ablated Resin

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Laser Resin Liquifier
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Converts, collects and destroys nearby Ablated Resin.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Work Floor Excavator
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Excavates a 3 metre tall workfloor, 16 metres in each direction (33m in total)

ValueEntry.Name: Workfloor Excavator MK1
ValueEntry.Description: Excavates a 3 metre tall workfloor, 16 metres in each direction (33m in total)

ValueEntry.Name: Workfloor Excavator MK2
ValueEntry.Description: Excavates a 3 metre tall workfloor, 16 metres in each direction (33m in total). Uses twice as much power as the MK1, but can cut through ores.

ValueEntry.Name: Workfloor Excavator MK3
ValueEntry.Description: A blazingly-fast catherine wheel of excavation - 4x faster than the MK2s! Will cut through ores.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Teleporter
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Teleport player to location set by installed Location Marker. Requires lots of power!

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Advanced Teleporter
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Teleport the player to another Advanced Teleporter.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Geological Surveyor
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Ensures your Quarries are correctly placed.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: CryoMine
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Explodes with noxious gas when touched by CryoPlasm.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Freezon Injector
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Utilises Freezon Canisters to provide performance benefits to a number of machines.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: H.E.I.S.T.
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Hopper Emptying Inventory Storage Transporter - Automatically transmits items into the player's inventory. H.E.I.S.T. for short.

ValueEntry.Name: H.E.I.S.T.
ValueEntry.Description: Hopper Emptying Inventory Storage Transporter - Automatically transmits items into the player's inventory. H.E.I.S.T. for short.

ValueEntry.Name: SUPER H.E.I.S.T.
ValueEntry.Description: Like the H.E.I.S.T. only 16 times faster. This item requires the Dapper DLC to work

TerrainDataEntry.Name: NanoDisintegrator
TerrainDataEntry.Description: NanoDisintegrator. Use this to perfectly excavate a 3x3x3 area of even the very hardest material. Use with care.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Slime Attractor
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Attracts slimes.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Waypoint Machine
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Place this and give power to auto-generate a waypoint. Override the waypoint name by placing an adjacent sign.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: MobSpawner
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Great for testing defences.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Threat Agitator
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Generates additional commutative threat.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Threat Reducer
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Reduces threat substantially.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Manufacturing Plant

ValueEntry.Name: Manufacturing Plant
ValueEntry.Description: Central automated crafting machine.\nRequires power.

ValueEntry.Name: Basic Manufacturing Plant
ValueEntry.Description: Only allows crafting through automated processing.\nRequires power.

TerrainDataEntry.Description: Central automated crafting machine.\nCan be upgraded by attaching modules.\nRequires power.

ValueEntry.Name: 3D Printer
ValueEntry.Description: Manufacturing Plant module.\nUnlocks 3D Printer recipes when\nattached to Manufacturing Plant.

ValueEntry.Name: Compressor
ValueEntry.Description: Manufacturing Plant module.\nUnlocks Compressor when\nattached to Manufacturing Plant.

ValueEntry.Name: Extruder Module
ValueEntry.Description: Manufacturing Plant module.\nUnlocks Extruder recipes when\nattached to Manufacturing Plant.

ValueEntry.Name: Chip Etcher
ValueEntry.Description: Manufacturing Plant module.\nUnlocks Chip Etcher recipes when\nattached to Manufacturing Plant.

ValueEntry.Name: Hydrojet Cutter
ValueEntry.Description: Manufacturing Plant module.\nUnlocks Hydrojet Cutter recipes when\nattached to Manufacturing Plant.

ValueEntry.Name: Robotic Welder
ValueEntry.Description: Manufacturing Plant module.\nUnlocks Robotic Welder recipes when attached to Manufacturing Plant.

ValueEntry.Name: Incubator
ValueEntry.Description: Manufacturing Plant module.\nUnlocks Incubator recipes when attached to Manufacturing Plant.

ValueEntry.Name: Assembly Station
ValueEntry.Description: Manufacturing Plant module.\nUnlocks Assembly Station recipes when attached to Manufacturing Plant.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Refinery Controller
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Controls the reaction processes that allow recombining carbohydrates into other forms.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Refinery Reactor Vat
TerrainDataEntry.Description: The player should not ever be able to read this...

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Jet Turbine Generator
TerrainDataEntry.Description: The player should not ever be able to read this...

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Advanced Machine Block
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Crafting component of tier 3 machinery. Can also be used for construction

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Imbued Machine Block
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Crafting component of tier 4 machinery. Can also be used for construction

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Storage Crate
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Simple storage solution.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Mass Storage Block
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Basic Mass Storage Solution (25 Capacity)

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Mass Storage Input Port Base
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Use this to insert resources into Mass Storage

ValueEntry.Name: Basic Mass Storage Input Port
ValueEntry.Description: Use this to insert resources into Mass Storage. Carries 5 resources at a time.

ValueEntry.Name: Mass Storage Input Port
ValueEntry.Description: Use this to insert resources into Mass Storage. Carries 12 resources at a time.

ValueEntry.Name: Bulk Mass Storage Input Port
ValueEntry.Description: Use this to insert resources into Mass Storage. Carries 25 resources at a time.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Mass Storage Output Port Base
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Use this to remove resources from Mass Storage

ValueEntry.Name: Basic Mass Storage Output Port
ValueEntry.Description: Use this to remove resources from Mass Storage. Carries 5 resources at a time.

ValueEntry.Name: Mass Storage Output Port
ValueEntry.Description: Use this to remove resources from Mass Storage. Carries 12 resources at a time.

ValueEntry.Name: Bulk Mass Storage Output Port
ValueEntry.Description: Use this to remove resources from Mass Storage. Carries 25 resources at a time.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Mass Storage Controller
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Mass Storage Controller for Powered Mass Storage

ValueEntry.Name: Mass Storage Controller
ValueEntry.Description: Mass Storage Controller for Powered Mass Storage

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Macerator
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Search unused rocks for ore

TerrainDataEntry.Name: ARTHER Charging Station
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Rapidly recharge ARTHER

TerrainDataEntry.Name: S.A.R.A.H. Dock
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Place to give acces to the Storage And Retrieval Automated Hauler

TerrainDataEntry.Name: ARTHER Turret
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Allows ARTHER to get his murder on.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Auto Builder
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Automatically construct basic logistics setups

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Auto Upgrader
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Automatically upgrade the rank of conveyors

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Deployed Explosive
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Supply power to increase explosion radius

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Laboratory
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Not relevant

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Basic Quarry
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Digs a 9 metre big shaft, deep into the surface of the planet.

ValueEntry.Description: Makes and controls a generic room.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: MEDBAY_IRRELEVANT

ValueEntry.Name: Basic MedBay
ValueEntry.Description: Place on a wall in a room, give it power, and stand near it to heal.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Ampule Dispenser
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Not relevant.

ValueEntry.Name: Ampule Dispenser
ValueEntry.Description: Place above an Ampule Crafter

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Cloning_Bay_IRRELEVANT
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Not relevant.

ValueEntry.Name: Cloning Bay
ValueEntry.Description: Place in a room, give it power, and dying becomes less annoying.

ValueEntry.Name: Room Heater
ValueEntry.Description: Used in the Cold Cavern to reduce suit power usage.

ValueEntry.Name: Room Cooler
ValueEntry.Description: Used in the Magma Cavern to reduce suit power usage.

ValueEntry.Name: Room Vaporator
ValueEntry.Description: Use to increase the rate of Plant growth inside your rooms.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Base Scanner
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Not relevant.

ValueEntry.Name: Base Scanner
ValueEntry.Description: Place in a room. Observe. Learn. Progress!

ValueEntry.Description: Lights rooms. Paintable!

ValueEntry.Description: Place somewhere obvious!

TerrainDataEntry.Name: T5 Power Storage
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Not relevant

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Solar Panel MK2
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Not relevant

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Organic Solar Panel MK2
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Not relevant

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Lift w/underside Piston
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Raises or lowers up to 64m at a rate of 1m/s.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: T4 Turret
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Not relevant

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Lift Compressor
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Requires Power.\nIncreases compression rate of T1 lifts\nAttach to T1 lifts to use.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Lift Manual Control Module
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Allow manual override of Lift\nUse Home and End to control!\nAttach to T1 lifts to use.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: MK1 Robot Arm
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Allows simple sorting of items from conveyors.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Robotic Sorter
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Allows simple bus setups.

ValueEntry.Name: Basic Robotic Sorter
ValueEntry.Description: Allows simple bus setups.

ValueEntry.Name: Intermediate Robotic Sorter
ValueEntry.Description: Allows fast bus setups.

ValueEntry.Name: Upgraded Robotic Sorter
ValueEntry.Description: Allows faster bus setups.

ValueEntry.Name: Bulk Robotic Sorter
ValueEntry.Description: Allows for the fastest bus setups.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Machine Placement
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Used to build various multiblock machines

ValueEntry.Name: Refinery Reactor Vat Component
ValueEntry.Description: Contains biochemical reactions under high pressure. Place in a 3x3x3 cube to form a Reactor Vat. Attach a Refinery Controller to operate.

ValueEntry.Name: Jet Turbine Generator Housing
ValueEntry.Description: Burns HEC Fuel to drive a turbine generating lots of power. Build in a 4 by 3 horizontal shape, and build 3 high. Attach an intake to form the front of the machine.

ValueEntry.Name: Jet Turbine Generator Intake
ValueEntry.Description: The Turbine Generator intake is placed at the front of the housing in a 3 by 3 vertical shape.

ValueEntry.Name: Laboratory Component
ValueEntry.Description: Performs automated experiments. Place in a 3x3x3 cube to create a Laboratory.(Needs 27 in total)

ValueEntry.Name: Orbital Energy Transmitter Component
ValueEntry.Description: Use this to beam power off-planet. Place 9 wide by 13 high by 9 deep to form a valid OET.(Needs 1053 in total)

ValueEntry.Name: MK4 Battery Component
ValueEntry.Description: Build in a 3x3x3 configuration for larger storage solutions.(Needs 27 in total)

ValueEntry.Name: Conduit
ValueEntry.Description: Connect T4 batteries at a distance of up to 128 metres at over 10,000 PPS. Build in a 3x3x1 configuration, attached to a T4 PSB.

ValueEntry.Name: MK5 Battery Component
ValueEntry.Description: Build in a 5wx9hx5d configuration for the largest storage solutions.(Needs 225 in total)

ValueEntry.Name: MK2 Solar Panel Component
ValueEntry.Description: Create a 3wx1hx3d Solar Panel. Can ONLY be built on top of high-tier machines.

ValueEntry.Name: T4 Energy Turret component
ValueEntry.Description: Create a 3x3x3 Turret. High Damage, High Energy usage.

ValueEntry.Name: Fusion Reactor Pylon comp.
ValueEntry.Description: Create a pylon as part of a Fusion Reactor configuration. Use the Fusion Reactor Monitor for a build guide.

ValueEntry.Name: Geothermal Generator comp.
ValueEntry.Description: Generates heat through temperature difference. Build in a 5wx3hx5d configuration.

ValueEntry.Name: Trencher Drill component
ValueEntry.Description: Forms the drill head of a Trencher Drill. Build in a 3wx3hx3d configuration in front of a motor. (27 in total)

ValueEntry.Name: Trencher Motor component
ValueEntry.Description: Forms the motor of a Trencher Drill. Build in a 3wx3hx3d configuration behind a drill head. (27 in total)

ValueEntry.Name: Blast Furnace component
ValueEntry.Description: Forms a Blast Furnace. Build in a 3wx7hx3d configuration. (63 in total)

ValueEntry.Name: Casting Basin component
ValueEntry.Description: Forms a Continuous Casting Basin. Build in a 5wx3hx5d configuration. (75 in total)

ValueEntry.Name: Cargo Lift Controller
ValueEntry.Description: Deploys rack rails and allows a cargo lift to operate. Build in a 3x1x3 configuration

ValueEntry.Name: Spiderbot Base Component
ValueEntry.Description: Allows upgrades and recharging of SpiderBot weaponry and items. Build in a 15x1x15 configuration.

ValueEntry.Name: MK2 Organic Solar Component
ValueEntry.Description: Create a 3wx1hx3d Solar Panel. Collects a minimal amount at night.

ValueEntry.Name: Climate Control Centre
ValueEntry.Description: Starts to heat up the Cold Caverns and make them habitable for human life. Build in a 5wx7hx5d configuration. (175 in total)

ValueEntry.Name: Hard Rock Grinder
ValueEntry.Description: A single-use, multiblock machine. Allows you to collect a minimal amount of Chromium or Molybdenum. Build in a 3x1x3 configuration.

ValueEntry.Name: MagmaBore Component
ValueEntry.Description: Cuts an enormous bore down to the magma caverns in order to flood the Cold Caverns with heat. Build in a 33wx3hx33d configuration (3276 total) Needs 8m of initial clearance.

ValueEntry.Name: Particle Filter
ValueEntry.Description: Removes useful particulates from the air. Unlikely to make a long-term permanent difference to the air quality. Build in a 5wx3hx5d configuration. (75 in total)

ValueEntry.Name: Particle Compressor
ValueEntry.Description: Compresses low pressure gas, ready to be stored then bottled. Build in a 3x3x3 configuration.

ValueEntry.Name: Particle Storage
ValueEntry.Description: Stores compressed gas, ready to be bottled. Build in a 3wx7hx3d configuration.(63 in total)

ValueEntry.Name: Gas Bottler
ValueEntry.Description: Decants compressed gas into useful containers. Build in a 3x3x9 configuration.(81 in total)

ValueEntry.Name: Induction Charger
ValueEntry.Description: Provides power routing over a 5x5 area.

ValueEntry.Name: CryoPlasm Dazzler Turret
ValueEntry.Description: Long-range, fast, CryoPlasm defence. Can only work in straight lines. Requires 250k power to trigger.

ValueEntry.Name: Ore Thief
ValueEntry.Description: Automatically removes ore from your inventory whilst standing on it and places it into attached Hoppers. Build in a 3x3 layout.

ValueEntry.Name: Magma Storage
ValueEntry.Description: Receives Fluid Magma from appropriate machines via Fluid Pipes.

ValueEntry.Name: Cryo Inferno
ValueEntry.Description: The ultimate solution to the creep. Needs line of sight to an exposed Creep Spawner.

ValueEntry.Name: Garbage Thief
ValueEntry.Description: Automatically removes ore from your inventory whilst standing on it and places it into attached Storage Hoppers. Build in a 3x3 layout. Imported from FreedomWorld.

ValueEntry.Name: Bar Keeper
ValueEntry.Description: Automatically removes bars from departing network players. Also functions as an Ore Thief 3000, only for smelted Bars! Build in a 3x3 layout.

ValueEntry.Name: Trencher Drill Mk2 component
ValueEntry.Description: Improved Trencher Drill. Builds in the same way as the Mk 1.

ValueEntry.Name: Trencher Drill Mk3 component
ValueEntry.Description: Greatly improved Trencher Drill. Builds in the same way as the Mk 1.

ValueEntry.Name: Auto Organic Thief
ValueEntry.Description: Automatically removed ruined parts from your inventory.

ValueEntry.Name: Laser Borer
ValueEntry.Description: HEFC-powered Laser Boring device. Rapidly creates a 3x3 hole 256m straight down. Build in a 3x3x3 shape.

ValueEntry.Name: High Orbital Debris Object Reclaimer
ValueEntry.Description: Allows launching of a missile to knock orbital debris down to the surface. Build in a 3x1x3 configuration.

ValueEntry.Name: Fuel Compressor
ValueEntry.Description: Compresses carbon particulates with High-Energy Composite Fuel to generate an extremely volatile and energy-rich fuel source. Build in a 3x3x3 configuration.

ValueEntry.Name: Orbital RailGun Controller
ValueEntry.Description: Shoot stuff into space faster than your friends. Build in a 9x9x9 configuration.

ValueEntry.Name: CryoMap
ValueEntry.Description: Provides a useful real-time map for analysing and planning our defence. Build in a 3x3 layout.

ValueEntry.Name: AirLock Inner
ValueEntry.Description: Connects Rooms to Airlocks

ValueEntry.Name: AirLock Outer
ValueEntry.Description: Connects Airlocks to the Outside

ValueEntry.Name: Cloning Vat
ValueEntry.Description: Use this to determine where you will respawn when dying. Try not to die tho, it costs loads of power.

ValueEntry.Name: Glow Tubes
ValueEntry.Description: These massive glowing tubes appear to contain fibres that could be useful.

ValueEntry.Name: Never Visible
ValueEntry.Description: You should never see this. If you can see this then it is a bug

ValueEntry.Name: Glow Tubes
ValueEntry.Description: These massive glowing tubes appear to contain fibres that could be useful.

ValueEntry.Name: Never Visible
ValueEntry.Description: You should never see this. If you can see this then it is a bug

ValueEntry.Name: Glow Tubes
ValueEntry.Description: These massive glowing tubes appear to contain fibres that could be useful.

ValueEntry.Name: Never Visible
ValueEntry.Description: You should never see this. If you can see this then it is a bug

ValueEntry.Name: Large Rocks
ValueEntry.Description: Large surface rocks containing traces of ore.

ValueEntry.Name: Never Visible
ValueEntry.Description: You should never see this. If you can see this then it is a bug

ValueEntry.Name: Large Rocks
ValueEntry.Description: Large surface rocks containing traces of ore.

ValueEntry.Name: Never Visible
ValueEntry.Description: You should never see this. If you can see this then it is a bug

ValueEntry.Name: Large Rocks
ValueEntry.Description: Large surface rocks containing traces of ore.

ValueEntry.Name: Never Visible
ValueEntry.Description: You should never see this. If you can see this then it is a bug

ValueEntry.Name: Scrap Track Straight
ValueEntry.Description: Allows freight carts to travel in a straight line at low speeds.

ValueEntry.Name: Scrap Track Corner
ValueEntry.Description: Allows freight carts to travel around corners at low speeds.

ValueEntry.Name: Scrap Track Slope
ValueEntry.Description: Allows freight carts to travel up and down slopes at low speeds.

ValueEntry.Name: Scrap One-Way Track
ValueEntry.Description: Directs Freight Carts in one direction at low speeds.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Freight Cart Station
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Supplies freight carts with designated resources as demanded by other freight stations.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Freight System Monitor
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Panel for accessing information about your freight networks.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Freight Cart Depot
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Lanches and recalls freight carts as needed to serve freight cart stations.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Tour Cart Station
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Station for deploying tour carts to travel to distant locations.

ValueEntry.Name: Track Junction
ValueEntry.Description: Allows Freight Carts to travel multiple directions

ValueEntry.Name: Scrap Track Junction
ValueEntry.Description: Allows Freight Carts to travel multiple directions at low speeds

ValueEntry.Name: Casting Pipe (Straight)
ValueEntry.Description: Allows molten metal to flow from Blast Furnace to Continuous Casting Basin

ValueEntry.Name: Casting Pipe (Bend)
ValueEntry.Description: Allows molten metal to flow from Blast Furnace to Continuous Casting Basin

ValueEntry.Name: Fluid Pipe (Straight)
ValueEntry.Description: Allows connection of appropriate machines. Can also carry gases.

ValueEntry.Name: Fluid Pipe (Bend)
ValueEntry.Description: Allows connection of appropriate machines. Can also carry gases.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Mass Storage I/O Port
TerrainDataEntry.Description: High throughput IO for mass storage

ValueEntry.Name: Mass Storage IO Port
ValueEntry.Description: High throughput IO for mass storage

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Workshop Placement
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Place in pairs diagonally\nCreates Detail block workshop\nSize 2x2x2 to 8x8x8

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Mass Storage Stocking Port Base
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Use this to stock a specified quantity of resources into Mass Storage

ValueEntry.Name: Basic Mass Storage Stocking Port
ValueEntry.Description: Use this to stock resources in Mass Storage. Carries 5 resources at a time.

ValueEntry.Name: Mass Storage Stocking Port
ValueEntry.Description: Use this to stock resources in Mass Storage. Carries 12 resources at a time.

ValueEntry.Name: Bulk Mass Storage Stocking Port
ValueEntry.Description: Use this to stock resources in Mass Storage. Carries 25 resources at a time.
